resources.string: Dance to the rhythm of your heart.

We\'ll ask a few questions to help personalize your app. \nExperience audio like never before. Listen to your favourite track with Rhythm. Explore Artists, Genres, Albums and play whatever you like. Intelligently refreshes store, wherever addition, updation or deletion of tracks take place. Intelligent, software optimization allows to save battery life. Includes both Light and Dark ( for Amoled screens) themes.
To display/play, audios files, Rhythm needs access to your device\'s storage.
The storage access is vital for the app to run. Without it, I am afraid you will not be able to proceed further.
The storage access has been granted. \nPlease press below button to proceed further.
In the preference section of the app the user can customize different settings like App themes, fonts, etc.
Switch between Light and Dark Modes. \nLight mode, however, is the default setting but using settings you can customize how the app theme should behave.
The color displayed most frequently across your app\'s screens and components.

The secondary color provides more ways to accent and distinguish your app. Secondary colors are applied on: Floating action buttonsSelection controls, like checkboxes and radio buttons Highlighting selected text Links and headlines
By default the app is built to use accent moderately. By turning this setting on accent will be utilized frequently in painting like status bar strips, toolbars etc.
Rhythm recommends that you update to the latest version. By downloading the latest version you will get latest features bug fixes, performance improvements etc.
Have feedback? We\'d love to hear it, but please don\'t share sensitive information.
if you enjoy using Rhythm, please take a moment and rate it 5 stars on app store. Thanks for your support
